name: BLOODSHOT (Ivan Konev, Homu_umbra, Lisovkik, Furka)
description:
First-person shooter in a dark arena that needs to be painted with the blood of enemies to see them.

Game jam theme: in the dark

https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-144

Features

  • Bloody first-person shooter — by killing monsters you paint arena with blood improving your visibility level
  • Boss battle — after killing 50 enemies you have to battle with the boss statue
  • The unique gameplay — monsters are almost invisible, you can only see their red eyes,  by killing monsters you paint level with their blood, improving  visibility of the level
